snippet: LINTON--Robert. The Board and Staff of Lincoln Center Theater are deeply saddened by the death of our Honorary Trustee, Robert Linton. Bob was a devoted LCT Board Member for more than 30 years. He was a lively presence at meetings, often expressing original points of view and sharing theatrical anecdotes. He loved the work on our stages and was an enthusiastic supporter of our magazine and education program. We send condolences to his wife, Margot, and his children and grandchildren. J. Tomilson Hill, Chairman Eric M. Mindich, President Andre Bishop, Producing Artistic Director 1/3
